## ST4300 Recorder

The Soundtrap 4300 HF is a four channel digital sound recorder by [Ocean Instruments](https://www.oceaninstruments.co.nz/).

This is a short-term recorder, capable up to 6 days of continuous recording at 384 kHz sampling rate.

[Link to website.](http://www.oceaninstruments.co.nz/product/soundtrap-st4300-hf-four-channel-recorder/)

## ST640 Recorder

The Soundtrap 640 HF is a four channel digital sound recorder by [Ocean Instruments](https://www.oceaninstruments.co.nz/).

This is a long-term recorder, capable up to 50 days of continuous recording at 384 kHz sampling rate.

[Link to website.](https://www.oceaninstruments.co.nz/product/soundtrap-st640-hf-four-channel-long-term-recorder/)

![*ST640HF*](images/Screenshot%202022-10-27%20124743.png)
